item.description:
Meet and socialize with others from our Baby Boomers generation.
This meetup is designed for those individuals born between 1946 and 1964.
Come to a Meetup and mingle for social fun, friendship, or group activities. We've been having meetups since the beginning of 2009 and we've been having a blast! We get together for social networking and some of the events are single focused.  I am seeing that people in our age group truly enjoy being with one another regardless of the activity or event.  Many people join and are looking for meetups specifically for Boston singles events over 40, over 50 and 60.

We've developed a nice core group and we'd love to have you be part of our growing community. It's important that you post your photo. We've asked for additional volunteers to organize events and find that most of you would rather simply pay a fee. The process going forward is that each person should voluntarily find and give $2 to the on-site event organizer.

We look forward to having you join us!
item.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun
